question: Who has been honoured as the Wisden's leading cricketer in the World for 2016?
explanation: Indian cricket captain Virat Kohli has been honoured as the Wisden\'s Leading Cricketer in the World for 2016. Apart from this, Kohli has already been declared Wisden India Almanack\'s Cricketer of the Year for the second time in its 2017 edition. In 2016, Kohli amassed 1215 Test runs at an average of 75.93, 10 ODI appearances fetched him 739 runs at 92.37, while he scored 641 T20 International runs at 106.83. Apart from him, Ellyse Perry from Australia has been named for Wisden Leading Woman Cricketer in the World for 2016. The Wisden Leading Cricketer in the World is an annual cricket award selected by Wisden Cricketers\' Almanack.
